word:
But strange fire has been offered in the use of harsh words, in self-importance, in self-exaltation, in 
                                                                           358
self-righteousness, in arbitrary authority, in domineering, in oppression, in restricting the liberty of God's people, binding them about by your plans and rules, which God has not framed, neither have they come into His mind. All these things are strange fire, unacknowledged by God, and are a continual misrepresentation of His  character.
